additional-correctness-explanation-on-mo: Additional correctness explanation on model solution
choose-quiz-item-option-direction-help-t: Choose the direction the quiz item options will be used to lay out in the widget
create-quiz-item-same-type: Create new quiz item of same type
error-answer-does-not-match-the-specifie: The answer does not match the answer format specified for this exercise.
error-quiz-item-added-after-answering: A question has been added here after answering the exercise.
explain-add-new-quiz-item: If you want to create different Quiz Type, please create new task with 'Add task'
fog-of-war-description: If enabled, the student will not see whether the options they have selected are correct or not until they have either gotten the answer fully correct or they have run out of tries.
give-full-points-even-if-answer-incorrec: Give full points even if answer incorrect
given-text-does-not-match-regular-expres: Given text does not match regular expression
layout-options-description: Choose the direction the quiz item options will be used to lay out in widget
limit-tries-explanation: Check this to limit the number of attempts at this quiz
message-after-submission-when-this-optio: Message after submission when this option selected
message-on-model-solution-when-this-opti: Message on model solution when this option selected
multiple-choice-grading-default-descript: Give points only if all correct options were chosen and none of the incorrect ones were selected
multiple-choice-grading-points-off-incor: Wrong options will reduce the points
multiple-choice-grading-points-off-unsel: Reduce points from incorrect and unselected options
Wrong options and unselected correct options will reduce the points
multiple-choice-grading-some-correct-non: Give full points if some of the correct options were chosen and none of the incorrect ones were selected
on-each-quiz-item-answer-option: On each quiz item answer option
quiz-checkbox-description: Check boxes or not -- right or wrong answers
quiz-essay-description: For writing essays or just some text
quiz-item-display-direction: The direction in which items should appear in.
quiz-item-type-not-supported: This quiz type is not yet supported.
quiz-matrix-description: Assignment to write answer in the form of a matrix
quiz-multiple-choice-description: Choose correct answer from list of options
quiz-multiple-choice-dropdown-descriptio: Choose correct option from dropdown menu
quiz-open-description: Student writes a specific answer, validated with regex
quiz-scale-description: Each question can be answer with number scale e.g. 1-5
quiz-timeline-description: Match years to events on a timeline
shuffle-option-description: Makes each student to see the options in a different order.
this-feature-is-only-meant-for-closed-en: At the moment this feature is only meant for closed end questions when filling multiple short fields, like vector representations.
title: Title
title-options-description: Add multiple options to this question
